attributes.action: lengthen school hours during the week and introduce saturday school for those students that need to catch up with schoolwork/homework
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that this will provide a better education for 11-16 year olds and allow students who are absent during the week to catch up with the work which they have missed, it will certainly increase the GCSE pass rates.
